targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} | logfmt | __error__ != "LogfmtParserErr" | status >= 200 and status < 300 [1s]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} | logfmt | __error__ != "LogfmtParserErr" | method="GET" and status >= 300 and status < 400 [1s]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} | logfmt | __error__ != "LogfmtParserErr" | method="GET" and status >= 400 and status < 500 [1s]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="cas/access"} | logfmt | __error__ != "LogfmtParserErr" | method="GET" and status >= 500 [1s]))
